name: Rend Body III
book: Pathfinder Player Companion: Psychic Anthology © 2017, Paizo Inc.
text: This spell functions as per rend body I, but the target takes 1d8 points of damage per caster level you have (maximum 15d8), and if a limb is ripped from its body, the target is sickened for as long as the bleed damage persists. This spell can be undercast.
text_zh: 该法术的功能如同撕扯肢体II一般，除了目标承受每个你的施法者等级1d8点伤害（最大15d8点伤害），另外，如果有肢体被从身体上扯断，只要流血伤害依然保持，目标就会恶心（sickened）。该法术可以被降阶施法。
